channel.title: Tabletop Gaming on Game Manglement
channel.description: Recent content in Tabletop Gaming on Game Manglement

item.title: 3D Printing: Basic Engineering
item.description: Late last year (2018) I took the plunge and ordered up a 3D printer to help me with my tabletop gaming (and a few other things). I’d had my eye on one for some time, but they always seemed way too expensive (in excess of $1,000 CAD) and I was unwilling to commit such an amount when I wasn’t sure of the benefits. Two things changed my mind: firstly, I did a lot of research into what could and could not be achieved with a sub-$1,000 printer, and secondly the Creality Ender 3 Pro hit the market.
